ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString(".word_read@p@text",ml);
    java.toast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
 var arr=title;
 var srt=title.replace(/ /g,"");

 var sfn=sft.replace(/$/g,".*?继续阅读。");
 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"　");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>

<js>
let list=java.getElement('@@id.catalog@ul@li@a');
let result=[];
let stat=java.getElement('@@id.catalog.0@ul.0@li.0@data-num').text();
if(stat=="1"){
	result=list;}
	else{
		for(let i=list.length-1;i>=0;i--){
			result[result.length]=list[i];}}
	result
	</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请换源或稍后访问~"}
</js>

cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());

    return base+source.get('surl')+'&page='+(page-1);
  }
})()

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!cache.get("ua2")){   
	h=JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microlinkhq/top-user-agents/master/src/desktop.json"))
java.log(h.length)
x =Math.floor(Math.random() *h.length)
java.log(h[x])	
cache.put("ua2", h[x],86400);
    	}
//!(/google.cn/).test(baseUrl)?h=java.getString("id.acontent@html"):h=decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.*?text=/, ''));
url = baseUrl.replace("www.bilinovel.com","tw.linovelib.com")
//re = java.ajax(baseUrl)
//re = java.ajax(url)
//h = java.webView(null,url,null);
//java.setContent(re); 
h = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
//java.log(h)
java.setContent(h)

h=java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children").not("[data-ad-client]").not("script")//Clear ads
//END
if(0){//jump old codes

original_list = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children")

java.setContent(h)
h = java.getElements("tag.body@tag.div.5@children");
//java.log(h[4])
//java.log(h.length)
if(h.length!=original_list.length){//there is repeat item
	

//replace to correct text
function confident(str1, str2){
	if(str1.length!=str2.length){
		return false; 
		}
		if(str1.length==0){
			return true;
			}
		confidence =0;
		target = Math.max(1,Math.floor(str1.length/2));
	for(let i=0;i<str1.length;i++){
		if(str1[i]==str2[i]){
			confidence++;
			if(confidence>=target){
				return true;
				}
			}
		}
		return false;
	}
k=0
for(let i=0;i<original_list.length;i++){
if(k>=h.length){
break;
}
ele = original_list[i]
str = String(java.getString("text",ele));
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log(str)
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(str.length)
//java.log(strcom.length)
while(k<h.length&&!confident(str,strcom)){
k++
strcom = String(java.getString("text",h[k]));
java.log("x")
java.log(strcom)
//java.log(strcom.length)
}

if(k<h.length){
if(java.getString("tag.script@all",ele)!= ""){
original_list[i] = h[0]
}else{
original_list[i] = h[k]
}
}

k++
}
h = original_list
}//close repeat item
else
{
	h = java.getString("tag.body@tag.div.5@html")
	}
//run readtools.js match words
//run js file's last line
//jsLink = java.getString("tag.script@src").match(new RegExp("https.+readtools.+", "gi"))[0];
//h=String(h);
//code = String(java.ajax(jsLink)).trim().split("\n").pop().trim().split(";")[1];
}//end of old code
h
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
var txt;
if (!bes) {
    java.webView(null, baseUrl, null);
    txt = java.getString("#booktxt@html");
    java.longToast("解密失败");
} else {
    txt = bes.map(b => String(java.base64Decode(b))).join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

)
</js>

\n?){2}/g,"

ruleBookInfo.author: $.page.author
ruleBookInfo.kind: <js>let data = JSON.parse(src).page; let tag; switch(data.status){case 0: tag = "完结";break;case 4: tag = "完结";break;case 1: tag = "连载中";break;case -1: tag = "已断更";break;default: tag =  "已下架";} let tags = JSON.parse(data.categoryV2); tags = tags.map((t) => {return t.Name}); tags.unshift(tag); tags</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.page.bookName

ruleBookInfo.coverUrl:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

let arrB = []
for (let i of JSON.parse(book_shelf_info).data.book_shelf_info) {
  arrB.push(i.book_id)
}
write_config('bookshelf.' + read_config('userinfo.userid'), arrB)

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)
let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "组外": []
  }
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "组外"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "组外"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["组外"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.key + "/multi-detail?bookid=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_list || result.book_info || result.data.result || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data })
</js>

let books

  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

})

bookSourceComment:
普通搜索说明：
直接输入关键词可以进行普通搜索
（关键词两个字节以上，一个中文占两字节，多关键词用|分隔）


高级搜索使用方法如下：

①基本格式（括号表示可选）：
功能1（功能2功能3…） 关键词
ps：注意功能与关键词之间要有一个空格！要不然无法识别！各种功能的实现只需要包含功能关键词即可实现

②高级搜索功能关键词
1.局     进行部分匹配（默认搜索为完全匹配）
2.精     只显示精华帖
3.正     正序显示搜索结果（默认为倒序显示）
4.回复|时间|人气     按回复次数或发帖时间或帖子人气顺序显示搜索结果（默认为按最后回复时间早晚显示搜索结果，一次搜索仅使用其中一个！）
示例：局部精华人气 穿越
         正精 穿越

searchUrl:
<js>
var pa1= /( )(.*)/;
var pa2 =/.*?(?= )/;
var body = "step=2";
if (key.indexOf(" ")!=-1){
var str1=String(pa2.exec(key));
pa1.test(key);
var str2=RegExp.$2;
str2=java.encodeURI(str2,"gbk");
    body+="&keyword="+str2;
    body+=(str1.indexOf("局")!=-1)?"&pwuser=&method=OR":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("精")!=-1)?"&digest=1":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("回复")!=-1)?"&orderway=replies":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("时间")!=-1)?"&orderway=postdate":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("人气")!=-1)?"&orderway=hits":"";
    body+=(str1.indexOf("正")!=-1)?"&asc=ASC":"";
   java.log(body);
}
else{
	key=java.encodeURI(key,"gbk");
    body+="&keyword="+key;
	}
body+="&page="+page;
    a="https://bbs.fanfanx.com/search.php?" + String(body);
   //java.log(java.connect(a).body());
</js>

result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
z = source.getVariable().split(",");
if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){
  src=eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function headUrl(url){
    var count = url.split('/').length-1;
    var a=url.slice(23,url.indexOf('/',23));
     return 'https://www.hujuge.com/'+a+'/1/index.html';
}
java.setContent(result,null);
let a1=java.getElement('class.result c-container xpath-log new-pmd').toString().split('<div class="result c-container xpath-log new-pmd"').map(value => '<div class="result c-container xpath-log new-pmd"' + value);
let a2=java.getElement('class.result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd').toString().split('<div class="result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd"').map(value => '<div class="result-op c-container xpath-log new-pmd"' + value);
let a=a1.concat(a2);
java.log(a.length);
var b = [];
for (let i =0;i<a.length;i++) {
    var str =org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(a[i]);
    var list={};
    let realU=str.select('span.c-color-gray').text();
    if(!realU.includes('hujuge')){
        continue;
    }else{
        list["title"]=str.select('h3').select('a').text();
        java.log(list["title"]);
        list["author"]=str.select('span.c-font-normal c-color-gray2 article-span_UGCkY').text();
        java.log(list["author"]);
        list["intro"]=str.select('span.content-right_8Zs40').html();
        if(list["intro"]==null||list["intro"]==''){
         list["intro"]=str.select('span.text_2NOr6').html();
        }
        java.log(list["intro"]);
        list["url"]=str.select('div[mu]').attr('mu').toString();
        list["url"] =headUrl(list["url"]);
        java.log(list["url"]);
        b.push(list);
    }
}
b;
</js>

</js>

if(result.match(/replace/)){
s=result.match(/replace.*?\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/\\/g,'\\\\')
num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}
	}else{
result
if(result.match(/txt_call/)){
	result="因网站问题没有正文"
	}
		}
result.replace(/(\\)+n/g,'<\/br>').replace(/.*?:"/,'').replace(/",".*/,'').replace(/"\}.*/,'').replace(/\\/g,'')

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'77800','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
这个源的cookie是抓取我自己账号的发出来给大伙用，能保持登陆状态多久时间不清楚，反正现在好几天了没自动退出，会不会限制多设备登陆没试过，我自己用其它手机测试是没问题的。
app下载地址自行百度或者https://www.123pan.com/s/q27mTd-c7UP3
注意：如果你自己有账号需要登陆或者使用时报错、列表不显示内容，就自己编辑源把请求头中的内容删了换成下方UA或其它UA
{
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; MI 8 Lite Build/QKQ1.190910.002) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/113.0.5672.62 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "ismobile": 0
  }

/*
version: 2025.0205
完善发现,添加搜索接口by河鹅和
优化搜索发现
目录乱序修复by折木
目录乱序修复可通过设置书籍变量来开启，默认关闭
发现添加最新入库，需要先登录构造本地数据
添加本地搜索，可通过构造的本地数据进行搜索，在搜索关键词前加上name:,id:,author:,tags:即可指定搜索类型，默认为搜索书名，例子：author:佚名
当前支持类型有author,category,id,intro,name,pornrate,score,status,tags,update,word,all，分别是搜索作者,分类,书ID,简介,书名,肉量,评分,状态,标签,更新,字数,全部
发现自动添加书籍到本地数据
本地搜索支持正则，例：id:^95[5-9]\d$、all:(白天|黑夜)
添加更多排序选择
添加设置每次并发数
2025.01.31 修改本地数据保存方法，不再保存到源变量
02.01 优化目录乱序修复
02.04 优化本地数据保存，将数据切分每50万个字符保存，数据网络导出最大为10M，超过10M请使用本地导出
02.05 优化生成发现方法
*/

<js>
booklist=[]
$=checkData()
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key,page,sortType]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word):/.test(key)){
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
		}else{
			[key,page]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
			type="name"
			}
			books=$.books
	for (let i in books){
    books[i]["id"]=i
    booklist.push(books[i])
    }
    Regkey=createRegExp(key)
    booklist=booklist.filter(b=>String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
  
  if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType){
  st=sortType||$.sortType
  booklist.sort((a,b)=>getSortValue(a,st)-getSortValue(b,st))
  	}
  if(!$.order){
  	booklist.reverse()
  	}
  if (booklist.length>0&&page==0)java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍`)
  else if((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0)java.toast("\n⚠️请先登录构造本地数据")
  booklist=getl(booklist,page);
	}else {
		result=java.getElements(".book-like a")
		count=0
		result.forEach(r=>{
			id=java.getString("href",r).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
			temp={name:java.getString('h4@text',r),author:java.getString("span@text",r),cover:String(java.getString("img@src",r)).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,"")}
			if (!(id in $.books)){
				$.books[id]=Object.assign({},temp)
				count++
				}
			temp.id=id
			booklist.push(temp)
			})
		if (count>0){
			java.toast(`\n✅本地数据新增${count}本`)
			setv($)
			}
		}
JSON.stringify(booklist)
</js>

ruleSearch.author: {{baseUrl.match(/\/e\//)?java.getString('span@text'):""}}{{$.author||""}}
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍\n当前为按${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"肉量":($.sortType=="score"?"评分":($.sortType=="word"?"字数":($.sortType=="update"?"更新":"ID")))}${$.order?"⬆️正":"⬇️倒"}序排列`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\n❎本地数据未找到，请切换搜索接口")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
try{
	v = checkData()
	id=String(e.select('[property="og:novel:read_url"]').attr("content")).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
	v.books[id]={author:e.select('[property="og:novel:author"]').attr("content"),category:Object.values(e.select(".categories a").textNodes()),cover:String(e.select('[property="og:image"]').attr("content")).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,""),intro:e.select('.book-desc').textNodes().toArray().join(""),name:e.select('[property="og:novel:book_name"]').attr("content"),pornrate:e.select('.pornrate dd').text(),score:Number(e.select('.score dd').text()),status:e.select('[property="og:novel:status"]').attr("content"),tags:Object.values(e.select('.tag a').textNodes()),update:String(e.select('.new dd').textNodes()[0]).trim(),word:e.select(".wordcount dd").text()}
	setv(v)
} catch(error) {
	java.log(error)
}
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\n✅目录乱序修复已开启")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/第(\d+)(-\d+)?章/);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = chapters
}
chapterData
</js>

bookSourceComment:
这个源的cookie是抓取我自己账号的发出来给大伙用，能保持登陆状态多久时间不清楚，反正现在好几天了没自动退出，会不会限制多设备登陆没试过，我自己用其它手机测试是没问题的。
app下载地址自行百度或者https://www.123pan.com/s/q27mTd-c7UP3
注意：如果你自己有账号需要登陆或者使用时报错、列表不显示内容，就自己编辑源把请求头中的内容删了换成下方UA或其它UA
{
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; MI 8 Lite Build/QKQ1.190910.002) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/113.0.5672.62 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "ismobile": 0
  }

function fn(value){
if(/验证码/.test(value)){
	img = `${su}/styles/code.php`;
	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
       data=java.post(`${su}/s.php`,`searchkey=${java.get('key')}&code=${code}`,{}).body()
       return fn(data)
   }else{

}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
//java.log(result);
if(result.match(/请输入验证码继续访问/)){
  while (String(result).includes("请输入验证码")) {
    java.longToast("请输入验证码！反复输入无效可点击登录在弹窗里验证或使用魔法");
    url=baseUrl+"?_waform";
    imgurl = "https://www.xiguasw.com"+java.getString("img@src");
    verify = java.getVerificationCode(imgurl);
    body = `__input=${verify}`;
    rurl = url+JSON.stringify({
  "body": body,
  "headers": {
    "referer": "https://www.xiguasw.com/"
  },
  "method": "POST"
})
    java.log(rurl);
    Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(3000);
    result = rurl;
   // java.log(result);
  }
} result;
</js>

<js>
function generateUrl() {
    var i;
    do {
        i = Math.floor(Math.random() * 99999);
    } while (i === 0);
    var key = java.key; // 假设这是一个全局变量或者在上下文中已经定义
    return "/class/" + i + "_1/?p=" + key;
}

finalUrl = generateUrl();

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

} else {

searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

bookSourceComment: 正文为空尝试登录后刷新正文；尝试点击章节链接进网页，直到网页加载出正文后返回刷新正文

ruleContent.content:
<js>

cid = baseUrl.match(/-(\d+)/)[1];
	let token = java.webView("", baseUrl, "sessionStorage.getItem('token')");
	
header =
	{"headers":	{"referer":baseUrl,
	"token":token,"client":"h5"}};
	
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/novel/chapterGetInfo?cid="+cid+"&nid="+java.get("nid")+","+JSON.stringify(header);

html = java.ajax(url);

chapterInfo=JSON.parse(html).data.chapterInfo;
postscript=chapterInfo.postscript;
if(chapterInfo.content==""){
	result = "订阅本章需  "+chapterInfo.chapterPrice+ "玉佩"
	}else{
content=java.aesBase64DecodeToString(chapterInfo.content,"u0LRrbu$Enm84koA","AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding","$h$b3!iGzsYnnshj")
postscript==""?content:content+"\n作者有话说："+postscript;
}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.novel_author||$.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(/search\/novels/.test(baseUrl)){
	try{
	//搜索作者
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/search/novelAndAuthor?k="+java.get("key");

$ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));

userid = $.data.user.user_id;

url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/zone/userGetNovelList?uid="+userid+"&type=coll";

aid = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.list[0].author_id;
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/zone/userGetNovelList?aid="+aid+"&type=author&page="+java.get("page");

list =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
a= JSON.parse(result).data.list || []
result = a.concat(list.data.list);
result = JSON.stringify(result);
}catch(e){}
}

if(baseUrl.match(/usercoll\/getList/)){
result=result.replace(/[\s\S]+?<pre.*?>|<\/pre>[\s\S]+/g,'');
}else{
	result=result
}
</js>
$.data.list||$.[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.novel_name||$.name##<.*?>

ruleToc.chapterName:
第{{$.order}}章 {{$.name}}
<js>
vol = "{{$.type}}"=="volume"?" 📖 ":""
vol+result+vol
</js>
##第章\s*|第\d+章\s*(?=第\d+章)

try{ const bbb = book.getVariable("custom"); const sss = source.getVariable(); if (/jjwxc|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { function decode(){ baseUrl = `https://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/chapterContent?versionCode=381&${bDe(baseUrl)}`; //let date = "Mobile " + Date.now(); let response = java.get(baseUrl, {}); let content = String(response.body()); isPay = !/"content"/.test(content)&&!/"data":{}/.test(content); if(isPay){ let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(response.header("keystring")); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskeyLen - 1); let v9 = 0; for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) { v9 += accesskey.charCodeAt(i); } let v15 = v9 % keyString.length; let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65); let v18 = keyString.length; let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, v17 + v15 > v18 ? v18 : v17 + v15);; let v32 = content.length; let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) !== 0 ? [content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)]; let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest); } return content } let intro = String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g, ''); const hasContent = /"content"/.test(result); java.setContent(hasContent ? result : decode()); intro = intro ? `◎${intro}◎
` : ''; let content = String(java.getString("$..content")); let saybody = String((/关闭作话/.test(bbb) || /关闭作话/.test(sss))?"":java.getString("$..sayBody")); saybody = saybody.replace(/(?:.*(?:蟹蟹|扔了|感谢|投出|灌溉营养液|送的|谢谢).*?(?:手榴|月票|霸王票|小天使|火箭炮|深水鱼雷|浅水炸弹|地雷|营养液)([xX]\d+)*.*|非常感谢大家对我的支持，我会继续努力的！|.*?瓶[；~]|“.*?”(?:营养液|手榴弹|月票|霸王票|小天使|火箭炮|深水鱼雷|浅水炸弹|地雷)x\d+|读者.*?(月石|营养液).*|地雷感谢：[\s\S]+)/g,''); let say = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(saybody) ? `\n【📢作者有话说】\n${saybody}` : ''; if (/token|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { const vipc = content.length > 30 ? java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content) : `${/23110/.test(String(java.getString("$..message")))?"请使用安卓端的token":java.getString("$..message")}\n❗️登录后请先更新目录，再刷新正文`; result = intro + vipc + say; } else { result = intro + content + say; } } result; }catch(e){ java.log(e) } ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎|◎undefined◎

	chapter2=result.match(/◎[\s\S]+?◎([\s\S]+)/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');

function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('◎');
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[——◎。！？，；：\?!,;:》 】）”’…~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        for (var i = 0; i < chapterTitle.length - 1; i++) {
            var twoChars = chapterTitle.substring(i, i + 2);
            if (twoChars === '  ' || twoChars.includes('☪')) continue;
            
            if (targetParagraph.includes(twoChars)) {
                java.log("删除当前段落：" + targetParagraph);
                java.log("当前章节名：" + chapterTitle);
                java.log("相同连续文字：" + twoChars);
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}


let bbb = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
let sss = String(source.getVariable());
if(/净化/.test(sss)||/净化/.test(bbb))result = removeDuplicatedParagraphs(result, title);
result = result.replace(/<br\/>/g,'\n');

result
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(/incrementFavorite/.test(baseUrl)){
let order = Number(java.get("order"));
function sortBooks(data, order) {
  let sortedData = JSON.parse(data).addData;
  if (java.get("classid") == "0") {
    sortedData = sortedData.filter(book => book.classId === "0");
  }
  switch(order) {
    case 1: 
      sortedData.sort((a, b) => {   	
        return Date.parse(b.chapterdateNewest.replace(/ /,'T')) - Date.parse(a.chapterdateNewest.replace(/ /,'T'));
      });
      break;   
    case 2:
      sortedData.sort((a, b) => {
        return Number(b.favoriteDate) - Number(a.favoriteDate);
      });
      break;    
    case 3:
      sortedData.sort((a, b) => {
        return Number(b.novelbefavoritedcount) - Number(a.novelbefavoritedcount);
      });
      break;    
    case 4:   
      sortedData.sort((a, b) => {
        return Number(b.original_novelsize) - Number(a.original_novelsize);
      });
      break;    
    default:
      break;
  }
  return sortedData;
}
result = JSON.stringify(sortBooks(src,order))
	}
	
function transformNovelList(jsonData) {
    const data = typeof jsonData === 'string' ? JSON.parse(jsonData) : jsonData;
    Object.keys(data.novellist).forEach(categoryName => {
        data.novellist[categoryName].forEach(novel => {
            novel.cname = categoryName;
        });
    });
    
    return JSON.stringify(data)
}
if(/authorid=/.test(baseUrl))result=transformNovelList(result);

result
</js>

<js>
try{

var token = Map("token");

if(/(加入|移入|移出).*?\d*/.test(sss)){
let url,sign,signbody,r;
if(/加入.*?\d+/.test(sss)){
url = "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/addFavorite";

sign = encodeURIComponent(encode(signbody));
 post = {
 	"method":"POST", 	"body":"versionCode=444&sign="+sign+"&classId="+sss.match(/加入.*?::(\d+)/)[1]
 	};

r = JSON.parse(r)?.data?.list?.[0];

};

		}

if(!/批量(?:加入|移出|移入).*\d*\s*/.test(sss)){source.setVariable(sss.replace(/(?:加入|移出|移入).*\d*\s*/,''));

}

if(/\d+_[\w\d]{16,}/.test(token)&&!/1058/.test(message)){
	
let 	tokenUrl =  "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/chapterList?novelId="+novelId+"&more=0&whole=1&token="+token;

	}

ruleToc.isPay:
<js>
point=("{{$.point}}"=='0');
chapterMessage =!/VIP|番外/.test("{{$.chapterMessage}}")
if(chapterMessage||point){
	result=true
	}else{
		result=false
		}
</js>

variableComment:
源变量

填写【移出/加入/移入书架数据】 —— 这是用来操作晋江app的收藏的，如
移出尚未分类::0 会把当前书籍移出晋江的收藏
加入尚未分类::0,1,1 会加入收藏至晋江的尚未分类书架
移入尚未分类::0,0,2 会把已加入晋江收藏的书籍移入晋江的尚未分类书架。
书架数据：在登录页的【📚获取书架】获取，获取后将显示在源变量设置
刷新详情页生效之后会删除【移出/加入/移入书架数据】字样。
填写【批量移出/加入/移入书架数据】则不会自动删除这些字样，在阅读的书架刷新会批量操作，需要手动删除，避免重复请求。

其他源变量操作请在登录里查看【使用说明】

loginUrl:
<js>
 function getCode(){
 	 let app_signature_md5 = "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94";
  	let phone = result.get("账号");
  	let time = String(Date.now());	
  	
   let hashvalue = java.md5Encode(encode(phone+time));	
   let option = {
 	  "app_signature_md5":app_signature_md5,
   "app_version":"4.1.1",
   "channel":"default",
   "verify_type":"5", 
   "hashvalue":hashvalue,
   "username":phone,
   "timestamp":time
   }
   
   let body = "secret_content="+encode(JSON.stringify(option));
   let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/send_verify_code"
   try{
 let resposebody =	java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify({"method":"POST","body":body}));
 	let tip = JSON.parse(decode(resposebody)).tip;
 	java.toast(tip)
 	}catch(e){
 		java.log(e)
 		}
 	
 	}
 
 
 	
 function login(){
 	try{
 	let login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号")
let code=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码");
    let jsonStr = {
    	"app_signature_md5":"f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
    	"app_version":"4.1.1",
    	"channel":"default",
    	"uuid":"android",
    	"ver_code":code,
    	"username":login_name
    	}
    
    
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    let url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/verify_login," + JSON.stringify(option);
    
   let respbody = decode(java.ajax(url));
   java.log(respbody);
   let resp = JSON.parse(respbody);
   java.log(resp.tip);
   
   
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('❗️ ' + resp.tip + ' ❗️')
    }
    }catch(e){
    	java.log(e)
    	}
}
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let data=JSON.parse(result).data
let chapterList=[]
for(var volume of data){
	chapterList.push({
		name:volume.volume_name,
		isVolume:true,
		info:volume.volume_desc
		})
		for(var chapter of volume.chapter_list){
			var isVip=chapter.chapter_ispay==0?"":"💰"
			var time=java.timeFormat(chapter.chapter_time*1000)
			chapterList.push({
				name:isVip+chapter.chapter_name,
				isVolume:false,
				info:`更新时间:`+time+` 字数:${chapter.chapter_number}`,
				url:`/api/readWithEncrypt?chapter_id=${chapter.chapter_id}&nid=${chapter.chapter_nid}&preload=0`
				})
			}
	}
chapterList
</js>

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];

        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let {
  book_id,
  source: sources,
  tab,
  book_tts,
  tags,
  role,
  last_chapter_title,
  last_chapter_update_time,
  word_number,
  status,
  score,
  abstract,
  copyright_info
} = result;
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (proxy == "本地") {
  proxy = "本地网络";
} else {
  proxy = "服务器网络";
}
java.put("book_detail", JSON.stringify(result));

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let key = "";
try {
  let cookieValue =
    String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
  key = getKey(cookieValue);
} catch (e) {
  key = "";
}

if (key == "") {
  java.log("当前服务器未查询到登录状态，尝试查询其他服务器登录状态...");
  let cookieValue;
  for (let h of host) {
    try {
      cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(h)) || String(java.getCookie(h));
      key = getKey(cookieValue);
    } catch (e) {
      key = "";
    }
    if (key) {
      java.log(`已在${h}登录，退出查询，正在转移登录状态到当前服务${base_url}`);
      //java.log(cookieValue)
      removeCookie(h);
      removeCookie(base_url);
      cookie.setCookie(base_url, cookieValue);
      break;
    }
  }
}

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {
  book.setUseReplaceRule(false);
}
let loginStatus = key ? "✅ 已登录" : "⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录";

let lightDivider = "❇️───────❇️───────❇️";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;

let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 账号状态：${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
    ⚙️ 访问模式：${proxy}
`;

if (tab == "听书") {
  let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
  if (isValid(book_tts)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
  }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
  if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "书籍分类：", "🌈");
addBasicInfo(role, "书籍主角：", "👑");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
  let indentedAbstract = abstract
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
    .join("\n");
  info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
  info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
  info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
  info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "on") {
  info = String(info)
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
    .join("\n");
} else {
  basicInfo = "";
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
  addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
  addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
  addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");
  if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
      .split("\n")
      .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
      .join("\n");
    basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
  } else {
    basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
  }
  info = `‎\n🏷 数据来源：${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>

if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  var parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}`
</js>

bookSourceComment:
10.3日更新：
重要：必要更新，适配兼容新后端版本，后续会移除对旧后端版本的支持，未更新会出现无法使用的情况
1.新增七猫短剧
2.优化番茄短剧和七猫短剧专属播放器

注：阅读请使用最新测试版
1.所有源站每20秒最多15章，把预下载调到0-3之间使用[打赏VIP白名单无请求限制]
2.自定义源站示例：番茄小说,七猫小说  多个源站用英文,号分隔
源站名参考 登录URL //书源配置列表 v参数

3.源站带有❇️图标表示只能指定或@搜索

4.搜索模式：
书名@来源 多个来源用英文,号分隔
示例： 
系统@番茄小说，多个源站使用英文,号分隔
书名@类型 返回对应类型所有源站数据，可直接使用@方式搜索或者点击登陆切换模式
示例： 
系统@小说  听书  漫画  短剧等
默认书名排序
指定作者优先：
作者名@作者   作者名@作者,源站
exploreUrl:
<js>
let config = (() => {
    try {
        let cfg = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())[0] || {};
        if (!cfg.host || !cfg.gender) {
            cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
            source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
            java.toast("配置初始化完成");
        }
        return cfg;
    } catch(e) {
        let cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
        source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
        return cfg;
    }
})();
    
let rawVariable = source.getVariable();
let 个人中心 = 1;
let obj = (title, url, type) => ({
  title: title,
  url: url,
  style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: type }
});

let sort = [];
let push = (title, url, type) => sort.push(obj(title, url, type));

let currentType = "";
let currentSource = "";
try {
  let vArray = JSON.parse(rawVariable);
  if (vArray.length > 0) {
    let v = vArray[0];
    currentType = v.gender || "";
    currentSource = v.source || "";
    
    if (currentSource == "推荐") {
      currentType = "recommend";
      v.gender = "recommend";
      source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(vArray));
    } else if (currentType == "recommend") {
      currentType = "boy";
      v.gender = "boy";
      source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(vArray));
    }
  }
} catch(e) {
  currentType = "";
  currentSource = "";
}

const getGenderDisplayName = (gender) => {
  if (gender == "boy") return "男频";
  if (gender == "girl") return "女频";
  if (gender == "recommend") return "推荐";
  return "";
};

const genderDisplay = getGenderDisplayName(currentType);

push(`当前为【${currentSource || "番茄小说"}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}`, "", 1);

const excludedSources = ["小说", "听书", "漫画", "视频", "短剧", "音频","番茄小说","fqxs"];

if (currentSource && currentSource !== "推荐" && !excludedSources.includes(currentSource)) {
  try {
    let apiUrl = `${getServerHost()}/type_api?source=${currentSource}`;
    if (currentType) {
      apiUrl += `&gender=${currentType}`;
    }
    
    let response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(apiUrl));
    
    if (response.data && response.data.found) {
      response.data.found.forEach(item => {
        let finalUrl = "";
        if (item.url) {
          finalUrl = `${getServerHost()}/type_api?source=${currentSource}&page={{page}}&url=${item.url}`;
          if (currentType) {
            finalUrl += `&gender=${currentType}`;
          }
        }
        sort.push({
          title: item.title,
          url: finalUrl,
          style: item.style || { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.29 }
        });
      });
    } else {
      push(`【${currentSource}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}暂无数据`, "", 1);
    }
  } catch(e) {
    push(`【${currentSource}】${genderDisplay ? `【${genderDisplay}】` : ''}暂无数据`, "", 1);
  }
  JSON.stringify(sort);
} else if (currentType == "recommend" && currentSource == "推荐") {
  
  let maleCategories = [];
  try {
    let maleResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/api?action=subcategories&top_category_id=1"));
      maleCategories = maleResponse.data;
  } catch(e) {
    push('男频分类加载失败，请检查网络', "", 1);
  }
  
  let femaleCategories = [];
  try {
    let femaleResponse = JSON.parse(java.ajax(getServerHost() +"/api?action=subcategories&top_category_id=2"));
femaleCategories = femaleResponse.data;
  } catch(e) {
    push('女频分类加载失败，请检查网络', "", 1);
  }
  
  if (maleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('♂️ 男频推荐 ♂️', "", 1);
    maleCategories.forEach(cat => {
      push(cat.name, `${getServerHost()}/api?action=books&sub_category_id=${cat.id}&limit=20&page={{page}}`, 0.29);
    });
  } else if (maleCategories.length == 0 && !femaleCategories.length == 0 && !femaleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('男频分类暂无数据', "", 1);
  }
  
  if (femaleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('♀️ 女频推荐 ♀️', "", 1);
    femaleCategories.forEach(cat => {
      push(cat.name, `${getServerHost()}/api?action=books&sub_category_id=${cat.id}&limit=20&page={{page}}`, 0.29);
    });
  } else if (femaleCategories.length === 0 && !maleCategories.length > 0) {
    push('女频分类暂无数据', "", 1);
  }
  
  JSON.stringify(sort);
} else {
  let recommendUrl = "https://api5-normal-lf.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookmall/cell/change/v1/?aid=1967&change_type=1&iid=1&app_name=novelapp&version_code=999&cell_id=7012498777642631182&algo_type=101&category_id=0";
let recommendPost = JSON.stringify({
    headers: { 
    Cookie: "sessionid=" + getSessionId() 
  }
});
  push('个性推荐', recommendUrl + "," + recommendPost, 0.29);
  push('巅峰榜单', 'https://fanqienovel.com/api/author/misc/top_book_list/v1/?limit=100&offset={{(page-1)*100}}', 0.29);
  push('出版榜单', 'https://fanqienovel.com/api/node/publication/list?page_index={{(page-1)*100}}&page_count=100', 0.29);
  push('爆更榜单', 'https://api-lf.fanqiesdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/rank/rank_list/v2/?aid=13&limit=50&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&side_type=15&type=1', 0.29);
  push('黑马榜单', 'https://api-lf.fanqiesdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/rank/rank_list/v2/?aid=13&limit=50&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&side_type=13&type=1', 0.29);
  push('热搜榜单', 'https://api-lf.fanqiesdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/rank/rank_list/v2/?aid=13&limit=50&offset={{(page-1)*100}}&side_type=12&type=1', 0.29);	

  let fqCategoryArr = [];
  let showCategories = currentType === "girl" ? [0] : (currentType == "boy" ? [1] : [0, 1]);

  showCategories.forEach(i => {
    try {
      let response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`${getServerHost()}/type?new_category_tab=${i}`));
      let $ = response.data.category_tab_data;
      
      let tabName = $.tab_name || (i === 0 ? "女频" : "男频");
      fqCategoryArr.push(obj(`❤️${tabName}分类❤️`, null, 1));
      
      $.cell_data.forEach(c => {
        fqCategoryArr.push(obj(c.cell_name, null, 1));
        
        for (let j = 2; j < 5; j++) {
          c.atom_data.slice(1).forEach(a => {
            let d = a.category_data;
            if (d.name.length == j) {
              let gender = i;
              let genre = 0;
              let cid = d.category_id;
              
              fqCategoryArr.push({
                title: d.name,
                url: `${getServerHost()}/type?category_id=${cid}&genre=${genre}&gender=${gender}&limit=20&offset={{(page-1)*100}}`,
                style: {
                  layout_flexGrow: 1,
                  layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.29
                }
              });
            }
          });
        }
      });
    } catch (e) {
      fqCategoryArr.push(obj("分类加载失败，请重试", null, 1));
    }
  });

  fqCategoryArr.forEach(item => {
  if (item.style && item.style.layout_flexBasisPercent) {
    push(item.title, item.url, item.style.layout_flexBasisPercent);
  } else {
    sort.push({
      title: item.title,
      url: item.url,
      style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.29
      }
    });
  }
});

category = () => {
    category_url = "https://novel.snssdk.com/api/novel/channel/homepage/new_category/page/data/v1/?aid=13";
    return JSON.parse(java.ajax(category_url)).data		
}
  
json = (data) => {

let categoryData = json(category());

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
    const {java} = this
    $ = JSON.parse(url).data
    if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
        arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
    } else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
        arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
    } else {
        java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
    }
    return arr
}

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
    let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck
        }
    }))

    bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
    let id_list = splitArray(bid, 200)
    let urls = []
    id_list.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })

    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

    let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck,
        }
    })))
    let group_bookids = {
        "未分组": []
    }
    book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
        if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
        group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
    })
    
    if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
    
    let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 200)
    let urls = []

    book_ids.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getServerHost() +"/detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })
    
    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
    let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
        "bookmall/tab",
        "version_name=5.8.9.32",
        null,
        ck
    )
    let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
    let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
    if (!tab) tab = []
    let bookList = []
    for (let i of tab) {
        bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    }
    return { book_info: bookList }
}

function normalizeResponse(data) {
    if (data.book_info) return data.book_info;
    if (data.data && data.data.book_info) return data.data.book_info;
    if (data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) return data.data;
    if (data.list) return data.list;
    if (data.book_list) return data.book_list;
    if (data.data && data.data.publication_list) return data.data.publication_list;
    if (data.result) return data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.result) return data.data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.cell_view && data.data.cell_view.book_data) {
        return data.data.cell_view.book_data;
    }
    if (data.data && data.data.records) return data.data.records;
    if (data.data && data.data.list) return data.data.list;
    return [];
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) {
    result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
} else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
    bid = getBookIdFull(result);
    id_list = splitArray(bid, 200);
    let urls = [];
    id_list.forEach(i =>{    	urls.push("https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=" + i.join(","))
    });
    let resp = {book_info: []}
    urls.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(java.ajax(r)).data)
    })
    result = resp;
} else {
    let w = baseUrl.split("/")
    if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
        result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
    } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
        result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
    } else {
        result = JSON.parse(result)
        if (result.data && result.data.data) {
            result = {book_info: result.data.data}
        }
    }
}

let normalizedData = normalizeResponse(result);

JSON.stringify({data: normalizedData})
</js>

ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
let tjurl = result.tjurl;
let source = result.source;
let book_url = result.book_url;
let title = result.title || result.book_name;
let book_id = result.book_id || result.series_id;

let detail = {
    source: source,
    url: book_url,
    name: title
};

if (tjurl && tjurl.trim() !== "") {
    let sourceMatch = tjurl.match(/source=([^&]*)/);
    let urlMatch = tjurl.match(/url=([^&]*)/);
    let nameMatch = tjurl.match(/name=([^&]*)/);
    
    detail.source = sourceMatch ? sourceMatch[1] : "";
    detail.url = urlMatch ? urlMatch[1] : java.base64Encode(tjurl.trim());
    detail.name = nameMatch ? nameMatch[1] : "";
} 
else if (book_id && /^\d{19}$/.test(book_id)) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(`https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${book_id}`);
    detail.source = "番茄小说";
} else if (book_url) {
    detail.url = java.base64Encode(book_url);
}

let yunurl = java.base64Encode(JSON.stringify(detail));
`data:detailsUrl;base64,${yunurl},{"type":"shushan"}`;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
let catalog = {
    source: res.source,
    url: res.url,
    name: res.name,
    tab: res.tab || "novel"
};

var tabTips = {audio: '听书', video: '视频', comic: '漫画'}; 
if (tabTips[catalog.tab]) {
    java.toast('当前为' + tabTips[catalog.tab] + '模式');
}

let op = {
    method: "POST",
    body: {
        source: catalog.source,
        url: catalog.url,
        name: catalog.name
    }
};

let catalogUrl = getServerHost() +`/catalog,${JSON.stringify(op)}`;
let response = java.ajax(catalogUrl);

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';

if (device == 'android') {
    var typeMap = {audio:32, comic:64};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 8;
} else {
    var typeMap = {audio:1, comic:2, video:3};
    book.type = catalog.tab in typeMap ? typeMap[catalog.tab] : 0;
}

JSON.parse(response).data.map((x) => {
    const isFanqieApp = ['番茄小说', '番茄短剧', '番茄听书', '番茄畅听'].includes(catalog.source);
    const urlToMatch = x.url || catalog.url;
    const bookId = urlToMatch.match(/book_id=(\d{19})\b/)?.[1] || null;
    const itemId = urlToMatch.match(/item_id=(\d+)/)?.[1] || null;
    
    let contentUrl = getServerHost() + `/chapter?cid=${x.cid}&source=${catalog.source}`;
    
    if (!isFanqieApp) {
        contentUrl += `&url=${catalog.url}`;
    } else {
        contentUrl += `&book_id=${bookId}&item_id=${itemId}`;
        
        if (['番茄听书', '番茄畅听'].includes(catalog.source)) {
            const toneId = Number((source.getLoginInfoMap())['听书AI音色编号']) || 1;
            contentUrl += `&tone_id=${toneId}`;
        }
    }
    
    if (catalog.source == '番茄小说') {
        const commentPart = `{"js":"book ? result : '${getServerHost()}/comment?sessionid=${getSessionId()}&item_id=${itemId}&book_id=${bookId}'"}`;
        x.url = `${contentUrl},${commentPart}`;
    } else {
        x.url = contentUrl;
    }
    
    return x;
});
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
let config = (() => {
    try {
        let cfg = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())[0] || {};
        if (!cfg.host || !cfg.gender) {
            cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
            source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
            java.toast("配置初始化完成");
        }
        return cfg;
    } catch(e) {
        let cfg = {gender: "boy", host: getServerHost()};
        source.setVariable(JSON.stringify([cfg]));
        return cfg;
    }
})();

var sourceVal = '';
var customSource = (source.getLoginInfoMap())['自定义源站'];

if (customSource !== undefined && customSource !== null && String(customSource).trim() !== "") {
    sourceVal = String(customSource).trim();
} else if (config.source) {
    sourceVal = config.source;
}

var param = sourceVal ? '&source=' + encodeURIComponent(sourceVal) : '';
var searchUrl = getServerHost() + '/search?page={{page}}&key={{key}}' + param;

if (key.length == 19 && !Number.isNaN(parseInt(key))) {
    var u = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id=${key}`;
    var kdy = java.base64Encode(u);
    var response = JSON.parse(java.ajax(u));
    var nam = response.data.book_name || response.data[0].book_name;
    result = getServerHost() + `/details?url=${kdy}&source=番茄小说&name=${nam}`;
} else {
    result = searchUrl;
}
</js>

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

bookSourceComment:
─────当前版本Pro V47─────
点击登录即可查看:
0、书源制作思路
1、版本更新日志
2、书源用法展示
3、相关问题解释
───────搜索格式────────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
说明：搜索“斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆$www.qidian.com”将在“www.qidian.com”中搜索名为斗破苍穹、作者为天蚕土豆的书籍
──────前缀设置全体───────
用法：“单跳逆原动静字图”等字后跟“^”再跟“搜索关键字”，可实现这些字对应的功能。
范围：本次搜索到的所有书籍都会执行指定的功能。
示例：“图^斗破苍穹”、“逆静^斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆”、“跳^斗破苍穹$www.qidian.com”。
─────⤵
跳：允许目录自动跳转，目录标题说点击跳转时可如此做。
逆：设置书籍目录章节逆向排序，配合指定网站的搜索方式针对小说全是逆向排序的网站比较方便。
原：设置书籍不进行净化替换，优点是加载正文快速且不会被误删内容，缺点是需要自己写“替换净化”规则并在正文中启用才能净化网站推广文本。
动：强制设置正文动态加载(正文默认会进行需要动态加载还是静态加载的判断，然后自动切换模式，若判断失误导致本应切换成动态加载却未切换时，可强制设置正文动态加载)。
静：强制设置正文静态加载(正文默认会进行需要动态加载还是静态加载的判断，然后自动切换模式，若判断失误导致本应保持静态加载却切换成动态加载而使正文加载时间变长时，可强制设置正文静态加载)。
图：设置成看图模式(不设置则默认图文模式)，只显示图片，不显示文字。
字：设置成纯字模式(不设置则默认图文模式)，只显示文本，不显示图片。
─────⤴
──────简介设置单本───────
用法：将“单直跳全逆原图字动静”中任意多个字或“[目录url]”或“[正文尾页url]单”或“数字#第二页链接#”或“[目录尾页url]录”放在“{}”中，然后整体插入到简介最前端保存，最后点击菜单中的刷新，就会触发这些字段对应的功能。
范围：详情页修改简介保存再点刷新，只会控制当前书籍执行指定功能。
示例：{[https://m.biquku.la/0/425/]全字}
─────⤵
直：不做目录识别，直接将详情页作为目录页，或以“[目录链接]”格式直接指定目录链接，目录识别错误时可这种做。
全：直接显示“预览正文”和查询到的所有章节，跳过章节筛选环节，单页文章和部分筛选后章节不全的小说网站可这样做。
─────⤴
──目录有分页却无翻页按钮或书籍无目录──
单：无目录打开即正文但有尾页或下一页按钮的书籍，必须设置为单向模式，这样书源会直接将入口页作为正文第一页，并将第一页及其所有下一页共同构造生成“正文1”、“正文2”…的目录形式来阅读，搜索格式“单^”、插入简介格式“{单}”。
录：有目录分页但无目录下一页按钮的书籍，可在简介中直接指定复制到的最后目录页链接为目录链接并添加指令“录”，即可自动生成所有目录分页。如：{[https://m.zuizaoxiaoshuo.com/ml/33280_13]录}
此外，通用书源还可复制最后那个目录页链接并在其后加“?录”添加网址，从而自动生成补全所有目录分页。如“https://m.zuizaoxiaoshuo.com/ml/33280_13/?录”
辅助生成──无目录打开即正文也无尾页和下一页按钮的书籍，需指定章节数量并用第二页链接作为参考链接生成所有分页。
格式示范──{220#https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html#}
效果说明──根据第二页链接“https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html”生成220条章节的目录列表。
单个章节──目录仅一个章节且这个章节正文中无下一页按钮时，可复制那个章节的正文尾页链接并用指令“单”，便可将所有正文分页构造成章节列表。
格式示范──{[https://www.yulinzhanye.la/20/20733/532447_9.html]单}
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Safari/537.36"}

─────⤵
直：不做目录识别，直接将详情页作为目录页，或以“[目录链接]”格式直接指定目录链接，目录识别错误时可这种做。

──目录有分页却无翻页按钮或书籍无目录──

单：无目录打开即正文但有尾页或下一页按钮的书籍，必须设置为单向模式，这样书源会直接将入口页作为正文第一页，并将第一页及其所有下一页共同构造生成“正文1”、“正文2”…的目录形式来阅读，搜索前缀“单^”、书籍变量“单”。

录：有目录分页但无目录下一页按钮的书籍，可在书籍变量中直接指定复制到的最后目录页链接为目录链接并添加指令“录”，即可自动生成所有目录分页。
书籍变量：“[https://m.zuizaoxiaoshuo.com/ml/33280_13]录”

辅助生成──无目录打开即正文也无尾页和下一页按钮的书籍，需指定章节数量并用第二页链接作为参考链接生成所有分页。
书籍变量──220#https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html#
效果说明──根据第二页链接“https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html”生成220条章节的目录列表。

单个章节──目录仅一个章节且这个章节正文中无下一页按钮时，可复制那个章节的正文尾页链接并用指令“单”，便可将所有正文分页构造成章节列表。
书籍变量──[http://www.yulinzhanye.la/20/20733/532447_9.html]单

───────谷歌域名说明──────

谷歌会逐个访问域名直到返回正确结果，可把可用域名放在“源变量”中(若不设置源变量，则默认使用内置的多个镜像域名和原域名组成的列表)

形如：https://www.google.com/search?q=

放置多个域名请用换行分隔

─────当前版本Pro V50─────

点击登录即可查看:

0、书源制作思路

1、版本更新日志

2、书源用法展示

3、相关问题解释

───────搜索格式────────

完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名

说明：搜索“斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆$www.qidian.com”将在“www.qidian.com”中搜索名为斗破苍穹、作者为天蚕土豆的书籍

──────前缀设置全体───────

用法：“单跳逆原动静字图”等字后跟“^”再跟“搜索关键字”，可实现这些字对应的功能。

范围：本次搜索到的所有书籍都会执行指定的功能。

示例：“图^斗破苍穹”、“逆静^斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆”、“跳^斗破苍穹$www.qidian.com”。
─────⤵
跳：允许目录自动跳转，目录标题说点击跳转时可如此做。

逆：设置书籍目录章节逆向排序，配合指定网站的搜索方式针对小说全是逆向排序的网站比较方便。

原：设置书籍不进行净化替换，优点是加载正文快速且不会被误删内容，缺点是需要自己写“替换净化”规则并在正文中启用才能净化网站推广文本。

动：强制设置正文动态加载(正文默认会进行需要动态加载还是静态加载的判断，然后自动切换模式，若判断失误导致本应切换成动态加载却未切换时，可强制设置正文动态加载)。

静：强制设置正文静态加载(正文默认会进行需要动态加载还是静态加载的判断，然后自动切换模式，若判断失误导致本应保持静态加载却切换成动态加载而使正文加载时间变长时，可强制设置正文静态加载)。

图：设置成看图模式(不设置则默认图文模式)，只显示图片，不显示文字。

字：设置成纯字模式(不设置则默认图文模式)，只显示文本，不显示图片。
─────⤴

──────书籍变量设置───────

用法：
将“单直跳全逆原图字动静”中任意多个字
或“[目录url]”或“[正文尾页url]单”
或“数字#第二页链接#”
或“[目录尾页url]录”
放在详情页右上角的书籍变量中，
确认后点刷新就能触发这些字段对应的功能。

范围：只控制当前书籍执行指定功能。

书籍变量格式示范：[http://m.biquku.la/0/425/]全字

─────⤵
直：不做目录识别，直接将详情页作为目录页，或以“[目录链接]”格式直接指定目录链接，目录识别错误时可这种做。

全：直接显示“预览正文”和查询到的所有章节，跳过章节筛选环节，单页文章和部分筛选后章节不全的小说网站可这样做。
─────⤴

──目录有分页却无翻页按钮或书籍无目录──

单：无目录打开即正文但有尾页或下一页按钮的书籍，必须设置为单向模式，这样书源会直接将入口页作为正文第一页，并将第一页及其所有下一页共同构造生成“正文1”、“正文2”…的目录形式来阅读，搜索前缀“单^”、书籍变量“单”。

录：有目录分页但无目录下一页按钮的书籍，可在书籍变量中直接指定复制到的最后目录页链接为目录链接并添加指令“录”，即可自动生成所有目录分页。
书籍变量：“[https://m.zuizaoxiaoshuo.com/ml/33280_13]录”

辅助生成──无目录打开即正文也无尾页和下一页按钮的书籍，需指定章节数量并用第二页链接作为参考链接生成所有分页。
书籍变量──220#https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html#
效果说明──根据第二页链接“https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html”生成220条章节的目录列表。

单个章节──目录仅一个章节且这个章节正文中无下一页按钮时，可复制那个章节的正文尾页链接并用指令“单”，便可将所有正文分页构造成章节列表。
书籍变量──[http://www.yulinzhanye.la/20/20733/532447_9.html]单

书籍变量──[http://www.yulinzhanye.la/20/20733/532447_9.html]单

───────夸克发现说明──────

夸克通过发现每次进入都会重定向到新的网站，为了避免刷新目录导致链接变来变去，故自动生成当前书籍链接方在“书籍变量”中。

想重新自动定向到新网站，可清空书籍变量确认后刷新，若不清空则一直访问生成的网站。

全：直接显示“预览正文”和查询到的所有章节，跳过章节筛选环节，单页文章和部分筛选后章节不全的小说网站可这样做。
─────⤴

──目录有分页却无翻页按钮或书籍无目录──

单：无目录打开即正文但有尾页或下一页按钮的书籍，必须设置为单向模式，这样书源会直接将入口页作为正文第一页，并将第一页及其所有下一页共同构造生成“正文1”、“正文2”…的目录形式来阅读，搜索前缀“单^”、书籍变量“单”。

录：有目录分页但无目录下一页按钮的书籍，可在书籍变量中直接指定复制到的最后目录页链接为目录链接并添加指令“录”，即可自动生成所有目录分页。
书籍变量：“[https://m.zuizaoxiaoshuo.com/ml/33280_13]录”

辅助生成──无目录打开即正文也无尾页和下一页按钮的书籍，需指定章节数量并用第二页链接作为参考链接生成所有分页。
书籍变量──220#https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html#
效果说明──根据第二页链接“https://wap.yqshuwang.com/2021n/02/14972_2.html”生成220条章节的目录列表。

单个章节──目录仅一个章节且这个章节正文中无下一页按钮时，可复制那个章节的正文尾页链接并用指令“单”，便可将所有正文分页构造成章节列表。
书籍变量──[http://www.yulinzhanye.la/20/20733/532447_9.html]单

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Sort = `{{get('sort',Get('o'))}}`;
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
path = 'init?platform=android';
url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
if(String(Account).length > 0 && String(source.getLoginHeader()).length > 0) {
    if (!kind) {
        Login();
        url = Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'GET') + ',"method": "GET"}';
        kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    }  
    cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);                                 
    exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
    var signdate = sign();
    cache.put("pica-sign", signdate);
    exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
    path = `users/favourite?s=${Sort}&page={{page}}`;
    header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  主　　题  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('最近更新', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/random`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('随机本子', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('大家都在看')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('大家在看', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('大濕推薦')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('大师推荐', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('那年今天')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('那年今天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI('官方都在看')}&s=${Sort}`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('官方在看', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=H24&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('24小时', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=D7&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('7天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   path = `comics/leaderboard?tt=D30&ct=VC`;
   header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
   url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path},{"headers":${header},"method": "GET"}`;
   exploreUrl.push(explore('30天', url, 1, 0.25, false));
   title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
   exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
   var kind = kind.categories;
   for (i in kind) {
       path = `comics?page={{page}}&c=${java.encodeURI(kind[i].title)}&s=${Sort}`;
       header = `{{Header('${path}','GET')}}`;
       title = kind[i].title
       title = Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? java.t2s(title) : title;
       url = `{{Get('url')}}/${path}`;
       exploreUrl.push(explore(title, url, 1, 0.25, false));
   }
   BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
   for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
      exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
   }
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var path = 'comics/advanced-search?page=' + page;
    var body = `{"keyword":"${e}","sort":"${get('sort',Get('o'))}"}`;
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/' + path + ',{"headers":' + Header(path,'POST') + ',"body":' + body + ',"method": "POST"}';
}(key));

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
Uid = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid"));
Uid1 = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "uid1"));
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('my=')) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Uid"), Uid);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("dmzj-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/UCenter/subscribeWithLevel?uid=${Uid}&sub_type=0&page={{page-1}}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nninterface')}}/api/getReInfoWithLevel/comic/${Uid}/{{page-1}}?uid=${Uid}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
U1 = `{{Get('u') < 3 ? Get('u') : '2'}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/0-${T}-${U}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/1-0-${U1}-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'm')}}/rank/2-0-3-{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api') + '/classify/filter.json?uid=${Uid1}';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url))[0].items;
R = `{{Get('r')}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    Filter = `{{String(get('theme','`;
    Filter1 = `') + '-' + get('cate',Get('o')) + '-' + get('status',Get('p')) + '-' + get('zone',Get('q'))).replace(/0-|\-0/g, '')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'nnv3api')}}/classifyWithLevel/${Filter}${i}${Filter1}/${R}/{{page-1}}.json?uid=${Uid1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tag_name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Android,DMZJ1,5.1.1",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
