var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('no-js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"验证").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
    if(String(Account).length > 0 && baseUrl.includes('/login')) {
        Login();
        let url = String(Get('url') + '/user/' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) + '/favorite/albums');
        java.setContent(java.get(url,Headers).body());
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/user/')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-6.col-sm-3.col-md-3.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.video-title.title-truncate');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    if(baseUrl.includes('/watchlist')) {
        var list = java.getElements('.col-xs-3.col-sm-2.col-md-2.m-b-15.list-col');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.image-item-text');
            img = list[i].select('.img-responsive');
            cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': cover,
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.thumb-overlay a').attr('href') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
            });
        }
    }
    var list = java.getElements('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.m-t-5.title-truncate.video-title');
        var authors = [];
        var titleTruncateElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in titleTruncateElements) {
            if (!titleTruncateElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                authors.push(String(titleTruncateElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        author = authors.join('/').replace(/(&| & | \|,|\s)/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/');
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].select('.title-truncate a');
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            if (kindElements[j].hasClass('tag')) {
                kinds.push(String(kindElements[j].text()));
            }
        }
        kind = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        kind = '♥ ' + list[i].select('.text-white').text() +',' + $('.category-icon').replace(/[ ]/g, ',') + ','+ kind.replace(java.s2t($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(java.t2s($('.category-icon') + ','), '').replace(/,+/g, ',').replace(/,已/g, ',').replace(/中,|中$/g, ',');
        kind = String(kind).replace(/^(.{36}).*/, '$1');
        img = list[i].select('.img-responsive.lazy_img');
        cover = img.attr('src').includes('blank.jpg') ? img.attr('data-original') : img.attr('src');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': cover,
            'url': Get('url') + String(list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')).replace(/(\/.*?\/\d+\/).*/, '$1') + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1)
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || String(next_1.select('.p-r-5.p-l-5.p-b-15')).includes(String(list[0]))) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/search/photos/' + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1) + '&search_query=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&main_tag=0&page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

        });

        Data();

        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

function x(a, b) { result = String(result).replace(a, b); } //debug function d(debug) { java.log(debug); java.log(result); } //同时加载多章时，自动验证成功后有的页面加载失败时重新获取 if(/.*1234/.test(src)){ //重新设置正文解析内容 java.setContent(java.ajax(baseUrl)); } //获取正文内容 result = java.getString('.page-content@tag.p.0@html'); //大概第四页正文有切割，需要调接口获取这一页剩余正文 if (/\$.post\('',{'j':'1'}/.test(src)) { result += java.ajax(String(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify({ "method": "POST", "body": "j=1" }))) } //d("正文"+baseUrl) //有问题修改下面正则 两个br标签换行显示 x(/((\s*)
\n?){2}/g,"

"); //d('1.0:') x(//g,""); try { // Aes解密 secret = src.match(/=\s*secret\(\s*['"](.+?)['"],[\s]*['"](.+?)['"],[^);]*?/); string = secret[1] code = java.md5Encode(secret[2]); iv = code.substring(0, 16); key = code.substring(16); //java.log(baseUrl + " Aes解密ok：" + code + "\n" + iv + "\n" + key) result = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(string); } catch (err) { try { // 乱序恢复 ns = java.base64Decode(src.match(/var ns='(.+?)';/)[1]).split(','); //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复ok") paragraphArr = result.split('

'); result = ""; for (i = 1; i <= paragraphArr.length; i++) { result += paragraphArr[ns[i] - ns[0]] + '

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/(]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //d('2.0:') //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //d('2.1:') //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //d('3.0:') //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "

" + result; } //d("正文"+baseUrl) "\r\n" + result + "hereispagebreak";
